item.title: Sun and Steel by Yukio Mishima
item.description: Link to epub Link to Youtube Audiobook Selected Quotes Chapter 4, Pg 36 Success comes when both the timing and placing of the blow are just right. But more than this, it happens when the choice of time and target—one’s judgement—manages to catch the foe momentarily off guard, when one has an intuitive apprehension of that off-guard moment a fraction of a second before it becomes perceptible to the senses.
